divs: sighting detailsi am 54 years old, now living with one of my daughters and grand-babies. i tell you this to give you a since of my normality in hopes you will believe what i���m about to say. we as a people of this planet, are not suppose to know of celestial colonies which have been associated with this earth���s mantled core, long before it���s surface was inhabitable. i have spoken what i know to be true, and now i'm watched. web sites i set up to get this information out, are being blocked. e-mail and their replies are being tampered with, even my medicines and health are being tampered with. it appears they want to rid themselves of me, and make it seem like an accident. if i go on, i'll just sound like a fruit-cake. so i���ll send you what the government under bondage, don���t want you to know. you might not get this e-mail, or i might not get your response if you send one, so i just send out as many as i can, in hopes some will get through. we have never been alone global warning\global warming earth's core is changing back the design and creation of earth's core was and is more than just a random creation of nature. from the beginning earth's core was purposed for a specific celestial function, and has now begin a timely predestined shift of it's mantle plates in the gradual return back to it's original function. such regressing changes are those which has off-sit increasing earthquakes, rising surface temperature, and increasing temperature changes in ocean and sea floors which will continue unto boiling degrees and the evaporation of all such waters. know that most all historical documents pointing to the end of days, were records established for an evolving mind of people that would one day seek to understand the science as to the why and how such devastating events were to take place. the core of this planet was property of an ancient colony and their governing power source, (god head) long before it's heated mantle core fell from a hidden pocket of space to then temporarily appear as a fallen star; throughout this galaxy many such mantled cores did fall which was recorded as the era when a tenth of stars fell from heaven; long before this mantle core's ignited flames did die out, and long before changes of this rock���s surface cooled unto tolerable degrees, the core of this planet rested in a higher region of space outside this seventh universal plane of endless darkness; even long before surface life spawned and began to evolve from the blending of dust-like dehydrated plasma and the passing of a released electrically charged solar-like wind referred to as the breath of god. this mixture of complex cosmic ions had been generated from upper space during the time all planets were much closer together in this region of our solar system. most all souls now inhabiting this planet, did also hold existence outside this seventh universal plane in higher regions of space; what many have failed to understand or remember, is that during all early evolving of this global surface we now call earth, there were also the re-homesteading of many celestial tribal colonies and many advanced celestial colonies which were falling from there once held higher celestial positions on the upper side of this known universal planet. most such tribal colonies and their associated advanced colonies knew nothing of the other tribal colonies and their associated advanced colonies before this famed falling of man took place, even though many displaced colonies falling in this region of the galaxy, were of the same parenting source of power (god head) which hold many associated branched colonies and their celestial alignments in place. yet power sources associated with colonies which were falling from their once held higher position, had been cut off in order to keep from contaminating their parenting source of power, because they themselves had become contaminated by the action of one. such fallen celestial tribal colonies are different from colonies of the neanderthal man. these were spawned by the blending of the previously mentioned complex cosmic particles during the core���s early surface evolution, many eons after the famed fall of man. individual groups of the neanderthal man were nurtured in separate tribal areas, they were overseen by individually established advanced celestial colonies. till this day, developments of upper celestial colonies and all works of their advanced technology, were kept secret from surface matters of this planet. over time, individual pyramid power sources associated with those advanced colonies which had re-established their homesteading above earth within pockets of hidden space which, began to loose energy, such energy controlled the very invisible walls of their heavenly celestial worlds. even those invisible walls encircling associated tribal colonies began to dissipate. during this era, pyramids of their exotic materials falling in frequency acceleration, lowered themselves from upper positions, to settle in view atop the surface of this planet. it was during the purging of each such pyramid���s ���plasma core��� eye, that cause a back-up of associated minerals to fill every open area of the pyramid���s inner structural design. after such a purging, the actual structure of the pyramid, continuing in it���s frequency de-acceleration, did vanish from view to set in what is referred to as the first level of the eighth universal dimensional plain, some refer to this zone as the first level of hell or purgatory. as each exotic structure of each pyramid vanished from the surface of this planet, each left behind a molded cast of their inner structures, one such casting is now referred to as the sphinx. this marked the era when gods became kings, and the era when their were giants (structural hosts of ufos) in the land. now that the very foundation of celestial colonies and their lands had fallen from higher celestial place, their flying crafts became permanent resident for a selected few from each colony of advance technology. the remainder of the colony���s ���plasma filament of intelligence��� referred to as a soul, were put in the collective of ���accelerated stasis��� inside a colony���s specifically designed mirrored global dielectric sphere (ranging from seven feet in diameter to twenty feet in diameter, depending on the size of the craft). some crafts were as large as known cities. each such mirrored dielectric sphere had been referred to as the ���bosom��� of the craft. tribal colonies had similar yet larger mirrored dielectric spheres which were fifty feet in diameter. these were those associated with the eye of a colony���s pyramid power source. in this manner a specific count of the colony could live out tribal lives in their settled regions. then at the point of disembodiedment, a soul would be drawn back into, their specific dielectric sphere to find for periods of rejuvenation during accelerated stasis. this would allow a soul already in stasis to be reincarnated as a tribal member. in time, all flying crafts large and small, began to deplenish of power. some hid themselves in mountains, some in the ocean. larger crafts were dissembled and laid in different places. all were to wait for the replenishing of a specific quantity of a pure plasma compound, unmixed with the electron element referred to as the (sin product). such a plasma compound contaminated with the electron, would not be able to accelerated to a specific marc necessary to quantum leap outside this the seventh universal plain. but then came this other distant and foreign colony of advance technology, which deceived the colonies of advanced technology associated with this planet. this wicked colony portrayed to have come from outside this seventh universal plain, offering advances of their technology for the benefit of all celestial colonies associated with this planet as well as for the good benefit of surface humanity. when they actually had a very devious plan in play. offering great advantages, this wicked colony secretly engineered a power facility using an unorthodox technology for the purpose of using a much heavier accelerated hydrogen gas. one part of their power facilities was adapted to facilities already on the moon unknowingly to many humankind, the other was attached to facilities already positioned below ocean waters as to abstract hydrogen ions from the earth���s core. with all things in place a powerful traction beam was activated from this colony���s associated giant ���cathode satellite��� which had been set in outer space by these wicked celestial perpetrators, of whom most all, celestial colonies associated with earth had believed to be a representative from outside this the seventh universal plane, and associated with their original parenting source of power, one who was to return them back to their original higher positions of which they had long since fallen from. but on that day, the beam was activated, the beam was used to widen a rip in a matrix of time, in order to pull out this colony���s associated ancient pyramid power source from the back side of the universal foundation from which it had been banished long long before. but the celestial people believed that this pyramid host was their new power source in which they were to draw from, and to further fool the celestial people, a switch of it���s powerful dielectric sphere functioning as this pyramid���s eye, had already took place. such a secretive switch of such a powerful head part, caused the celestial people to believe this pyramid host was the same pyramid host which had previously been deactivated and was now rejuvenated and resurrected. for this deceitful reason as the pyramid host prepared to elevated itself, most all celestial people attuned their crafts and facilities to the reception of this particular pyramid by way of the cathode satellite, and once the pyramid initiated it���s velocity spin unto marc of quantum leap, to sit at the top of this seventh universal plane far out in space, it became king and god to the celestial people. now up until a short time ago, this cathode satellite which set far out in space appearing as a twinkling star, had continued to draw it���s power from earth���s core by means of their adapted facility positioned on earth���s moon. having altered the original power facilities on the moon and the one at earth���s core, they reversed all polarities of the energy beam which linked the moon with earth���s core (through the bermuda triangle) . this in itself not only changed the frequency of earth���s ozone layer, it also severed the original alignment of celestial colonies which had already been established. these were now lost in space and time. now earth had become linked with the aligned colonies held under bondage by these of the wicked colony, and so was then the government of the united states. there was war in heaven but the wicked colony prevailed, until now; earth core is changing, it���s mantled plates have self started in a new arrangement, which is cutting off the unorthodox usage of it���s accelerated hydrogen ions. for this reason all associated with the celestial alignment of this wicked colony will fall from it���s position. this in itself is both good and bad for the people associated with the earth���s core. because of this, earth as we know it, will soon be no more, but both the celestial people of earth, and the surface dwellers of earth, will soon be free.
